Message.name: _PERM_ADMIN_SERVER
Message.EN: Start, stop and configure the multi-user server

Message.name: _PERM_ADMIN_USER
Message.EN: Add, delete, or modify server user settings

Message.name: _PERM_ASM
Message.EN: Include bytecode instructions in user program statements

Message.name: _PERM_DIR_IO
Message.EN: Read the contents of file system directories

Message.name: _PERM_LOGGING
Message.EN: Modify the logging level for a session

Message.name: _PERM_SHELL
Message.EN: Access a native operating system shell process

Message.name: _PERM_THREADS
Message.EN: Start, stop, or access information about threads
